transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes, good afternoon sir. Main Krishna baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Very nice. Hum baat kar sakte hai abhi senior manager baat karenge senior manager se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Actually, I am so sorry for that. Actually aapka jo account manager hai, unke through kuch samay se reach pe the kyunki kuch emergency tha. But aapke sath mein zada discussion khas raha nahi aur aapke beech mein thoda break kiya tha. By the related wo humne aapko inform bhi kiya. Sir, main aapse abhi janna cha rahi hu ki jaise Kolkata aur West Bengal hai, iske alawa aap jo buyleads consumption kar rahe ho, waha pe aapko dealing ho raha hai, koi dikkat to nahi aa raha sir?
Customer: Dikkat nahi aa raha matlab wo jo flooring tiles aap log de rahe hai, wall tiles, usme se hum to involve nahi hai. Usme se kya de rahe hai? Flooring tiles, wall tiles.
Executive: Ye to hum usme attach nahi kiya hai. Mera jo ceramic tiles hai, usme ceramic tiles aur kya hai? Bahut sare cheez jo tiles hai, usme se lead kyun de raha hai humko?
Executive: To aapko, theek hai. Abhi aapko jo dealing hai, wo all over India ka hai ya apne local ka hai?
Customer: West Bengal.
Executive: Only West Bengal mein deal kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Iske alawa agar koi bahut zada client ka bulk requirement hai, to aap West Bengal se nikal ke MP side ya UP side product nahi sale kar paoge?
Customer: Nahi nahi, mera manufacturing unit hai West Bengal. To hum UP mein kaise wo bhejenge?
Executive: To aap sir West Bengal mein aapka koi vendor hai? Matlab offline aapke kuch aur branches hai alag alag locations mein? Aisa kuch hai ya fir sirf aap manufacturer ho?
Customer: Nahi nahi. Manufacturer hu, dusre jagah mein office dusre jagah mein.
Executive: Haan haan, theek hai theek hai okay. So abhi jo hamara business hai sir, ye offline kab se chal raha hai? Aap kab se kar rahe hai?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Aapka jo offline business hai, kab se chal raha hai aapka?
Customer: Ye 2000, 2014 se humko hai. Is time ko, is time ko.
Executive: Okay. Abhi tak IndiaMART pe aapne sir IndiaMART pe aapne 28-30,000 invest kiya tha. Wo aapka obviously baat hai cover mil gaya hoga. Aisa to nahi hai ki usse business nahi hua aisa kuch ya service deactivate karna hai, continue nahi karna hai. Aisa koi plan hai to aap mujhe bata sakte hai.
Customer: Nahi aap log jo lead de rahe hai na, wo lead mein bahut kam kam lead de rahe hai. Matlab 10,000, 20,000 ye lead de rahe hai, theek hai? To usme se humko bola hai, pehle hi bola ki minimum mera ek truck ka maal aayega 1 lakh, theek hai? 50,000 bhi ho jayega. Lekin wo chota chota lead de raha hai, theek hai? Wo humko nahi samajh raha hai ki mera jo ye hai package hai, usme se kya kuch problem chal raha hai, ye kuch hum samajh nahi pa rahe hai. Big package nahi hai mera to sabse best package liya hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye wo to ek reason hai because aapka product ya aage se bol raha hu 2000 jab se bhi India matlab offline chal raha hai. Theek hai? IndiaMART pe aap 2023 mein aaye the, matlab 24 mein sorry. To abhi aapki company ko IndiaMART pe ek saal hua, basic service mil raha hai to aapki company ka interface ban gaya hai. Aur aapke competitor IndiaMART pe 10-10 saal, 5-5 saal purane hai. Theek hai? To unhone apna ek designation keh lo aap usme apni company ko us level pe pahucha rakha hai. Aur aapke abhi fresh customer to customer zada aapke paas jo bulk quantity chahta hai, wo client aapke paas reach nahi kar pa rahe kyunki company ki us level ki visibility nahi hai. Aap khud sochiye na sir, koi person aap matlab aap ek maan lijiye aap manufacturer yaha pe ho, aap 20 saal se manufacturer ho suppose that aur koi naya person aake waha pe manufacturer plant khol de. Paisa usne bhi lagaya, sari cheeze in fact aapse zada paisa lagaya hoga zamane ke hisab se, ek model type ke hisab se. Hai na? 20,000 jo cost hogi, wahi uska shayad ho sakta hai ki matlab maan lijiye 2 crore wo apna business shuru kiya. Aaj ki date mein usko usse zada hi lagana padega agar wo manufacturer aap hi ki location mein thodi doori pe khol raha hai. Theek hai? To aap jaha pe 20 saal se ho, aapki competition mein to pehle cheez wo company aa hi nahi sakti bhale hi product line same hai, pricing wagera same hai. Hai na? Client aapke paas bhi jayega, uske paas bhi jayega kyunki customer. Hum samajh rahe hai, hum aapka baat samajh rahe hai. Hum hum hum aapka baat samajh rahe hai lekin jo mera best package liya hai, theek hai? Aur lagbhag 35,000 per year, theek hai? To usme se mere paas jo lead aa rahe hai, humko samajh nahi samajh nahi pa rahe hai ki usme se best package liya hai isiliye aap log low cost lead de rahe hai, ye samajh nahi pa rahe hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main batati hu kya hota hai na. Haan yahi hota hai kyunki mera jaan pehchan mein bahut sare aadmi hai, theek hai? Un logo ka package 1,20,000 koi kisi ka 2 lakh, kisi ka 2.5 lakh aisa kuch package liya hai. Un logo ka bulk order mein jo aa raha hai, un log sab acche tarike se business kar raha hai. To yahi matlab. Sir dekhiye simple se do reason hai sir. Iska aisa nahi hai ki hamare basic package pe business nahi hai, aisa nahi hai sir. Un logo ko. Haan to wahi chal raha hai, last jitna diya hai maine. Haan. Main wahi bata rahi hu sir un logo ne bhi na IndiaMART se basic koi bhi company aaj ki date mein 15 lakh ki bhi services kar rahi hai na, to basic se hi uthkar point by point upgrade karati gayi hai. Direct IndiaMART kabhi kisi ko upgrade service nahi deta. Pehle wo basic se hi shuru karta hai, dheere dheere upar jata hai. To aapke jitne bhi competitor. Haan wahi to actually mera jo sales aapka jo sales executive hai mere paas aaya tha, wahi bola tha ki best package aap pehle pehle saal le lijiye. Uske baad agar aapka possible hai to aap ek kaam kijiye, dusre bar aap us package ko badha dijiye. Hmm hmm hmm. Sir dekhiye main aapko bahut zada. Haan. Main aapko sirf itna suggest karna chaungi aapne itna service dekhiye aap trusted ho ek platform pe, aapke competitors bhi hai aap us cheez ko leke bhi trusted ho. To discontinue jaisi koi cheez na ho better hai business growth ke liye. Dusri cheez aapne one year apna basic chala liya hai. Now services ka renewal time bhi hai apna. To aap apna basic na kara kar na aap upgrade service mein jao taaki aap bhi ko bhi ek saal ab purane ho gaye ho aap IndiaMART pe. To aapki bhi ab company ki visibility us level pe jayegi aapke paas customer khud se bhi approach kare aur bulk quantity wala customer aaye. Hai na?
Executive: Jo competition matlab dekho buylead aap jo bol rahe ho na ki mere paas jo aa rahe hai wo kharab aa rahe hai. Kharab nahi aa raha sir. Jo buylead aapke paas hai, usse 1-2% ho sakta hai jo aapke competitor hai unke paas buylead different ja raha ho lekin sir jo buylead requirement post karta hai wo all over India level pe karta hai. Aur bas itna sa gap ho raha hai ki buylead jab post hota hai wo paanch suppliers ke paas jata hai. Client wo buylead jo purane buyers hai us consumption matlab buylead post hote hi consume karke client ko call kar lete hai. Wo active hai unhone 2-2, 3-3 account managers bithaye hue hai. But hamari jo company hai hamare paas buylead ek to jaise hi show hota hai kyunki hamara first time hai cheezon mein itna active nahi hai. To waha pe kya hai customer se jab tak hum unhe call karte hai 2 ghante, 3 ghante mein already 4 log call kar chuke hote hai. Hamari call customer ke paas sabse last mein jati hai ya sabse last mein pricing jati hai. Jab client bhi paancho logo se call wall le li matlab sabke paancho sellers ke paancho manufacturers ke aap keh lo ek tarike se price le liya. Ab wo find karega ki bhai mere ko kiske sath deal convert karna hai to wo jata hi uske sath hai sir jo usko trusted lag raha hai jiski company usko is tarike se designed lag rahi hai jispe wo trust kar pa raha hai. Hai na? Hamari company bhale hi manufacturer ho sakta hai aapke kuch competitors aur vendors bhi ho. Hai na? Aisa bhi ho sakta hai matlab kuch vendors ho jinki company ho. To ye cheeze hai sir. To mera suggestion hai ki aap market ke hisab se aapko chalna hai aur aap usko wo cheez plan karo. Aap jo buylead ka issue bata rahe ho hum already correction isme kar hi rahe hai. Lekin ab ab jo competition hi bada hua hai to correction ke base pe 100% sahi nahi ho sakta. Aur aap agar isko basic pe reh ke hi mehnat karte rahoge output nahi niklega kuch time baad sirf aapko bhi samajh aayega ki kuch nahi ho raha chod deta hu. To suggestion ye hai ki aap please usko upgrade pe leke jao. Aap agar time hai to hum log discuss kar sakte hai is cheez ko leke. Bahut zada cheeze nahi hai sir bas aapka yahi hai ki aap ek bar mujhe dikha sakte hai company jo aap bol rahe ho jaise ki aap hi ki location ki main companies ki baat kar rahi hu. Aap ye Kolkata ki hi baat kar rahe ho kya sir aap? Ha Kolkata.
Executive: Kolkata mein hi hai koi aapke manufacturers?
Customer: Ek minute. Pichhe ek minute mere paas abhi lead mere paas show kar raha hai, theek hai? Bank interior design Guwahati mein. Theek hai? Guwahati Assam. Isme se hum location maine diya hi nahi hai.
Executive: Kya bol rahe ho?
Customer: Abhi ek lead show kar raha hai bank interior design, theek hai? To usme se show kar raha hai Guwahati Assam. Hum to us us circle mein hum involve nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Aap sir dekhiye hafte mein ek ya do buyleads pe na ye feedback de sakte ho ki aap is location mein deal nahi kar rahe. Aur aur ek show kar raha hai game jo interior service Madhya Pradesh. Isme se hum isme se hum involve nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi sir. Ye jo bahar wala matlab only for West Bengal. Main aapko usko ek permanent solution dilwa deti hu. Aap just a second. Ye same number aapko WhatsApp pe hai?
Customer: Haan sir same number WhatsApp mein hai.
Executive: Line pe ruko aap. Aapki jo company sir aap hi owner hai aapke alawa koi aur bhi owner hai? Matlab partnership mein hai manufacturer. Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi. Bahut sare ulta palti dekhiye Nasik Nasik ka diya hai abhi Andhra Pradesh ka diya hai. Chhattisgarh ye humne pehle hi wo hata diya Pune. Hum unko add kar dete hai not perfect. Nahi nahi only for only for West Bengal.
Executive: Haan sir wahi main bol rahi hu jin jin locations mein aap deal nahi karna chahte ho. Abhi aap kaha office mein available ho na sir?
Customer: Haan office mein available hu, kitchen khula hoga aur dusra cheez hai mera jo dusra number hai na alternative number usko bhi maine change karana hai.
Executive: Theek hai main bata deti hu just a second. Main ek short discussion kar lete hai jisme ye sari cheeze cover kar lenge just a second na.
Mentioned WhatsApp pe hi likh ke aapko bheja hai aapko receive WhatsApp?
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Executive: Just a second. Ye maine ek link share kiya hai isko aap join kar lo aapka number change kara deti hu main pehle to.
Customer: Kaise join karega?
Executive: Ye jo aapke desktop pe mail open hoga mail aap open karo ek bar India matlab mail open karo gmail account apna desktop register register.
Executive: Gmail account apna google desktop pe open karo email.
Customer: Haan email matlab jo register hai usme ya mera kuch personal ye hai. Nahi nahi aapko aaya wo aapko already hoga na sir wo desktop pe aap dekho pehle gmail open karo dekho IndiaMART ke side aapke paas koi link aaya video meeting join karne ka aapke liye.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Aap jo link bheja hai usi link mein.
Executive: Haan aapko mail pe receive hua wo link IndiaMART ke side se?
Customer: Mail mein nahi aap jo whatsapp mein bheja hai ye link.
Executive: Aap apne whatsapp ko desktop pe login kar sakte ho na?
Customer: Haan desktop mein login kar diya.
Executive: Haan to login karo join karo usko.
Customer: Hmm join kar diya.
Executive: Theek hai just a second na.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap apni screen share karo mujhe aapko dikh raha hai microphone option video camera option and third number pe share screen option sir. Share screen pe click kijiye ek bar.
Customer: Share screen just. Haan.
Customer: Share screen kar diya. Haan usme click karne ke baad entire screen option dikh raha hai chrome window entire entire screen pe click karo. Chota sa window beech mein hai usko select karo then niche share karne ka option aa jayega. Select karna haa badhiya ab aap ek bar seller panel open karo seller.indiamart.com first wala tab open kijiye. Ye wala? Haan profile pe aao. Profile profile haa. Haan isme edit option dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Ek minute system slow chal raha hai.
Customer: Edit option kaha? Abhi wo thoda slow hai na wo load ho raha hai. Hmm. Hum log desktop pe connect kar sakte hai kya matlab sir abhi voice aapko microphone. Haan haan ye ye jo ye jo number hai na 7439473347 isko maine hatana hoga. Main karati hu main karati hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants leads for ceramic tiles only.

- Receiving low-quality leads.

- Receiving leads from unwanted locations.

- Wants to change the alternative contact number.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about the company visibility.

- Executive explained about the basic and upgraded services.

- Executive offered to help with location settings.

- Executive shared a link to join for number change.

- Customer shared the screen to change the number.



Next Steps: 

- Number change and location settings to be done.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, number change
